meanings.definition: Worthy of note or notice; remarkable.
meanings.sent1: The noteworthiest achievement of the team was winning the championship.
meanings.sent2: She received the noteworthiest award for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The noteworthiest fact about the cat is its ability to open doors.
meanings.sent4: His noteworthiest trait is his unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in the noteworthiest shades of orange and pink.

meanings.sent1: The noteworthiest event of the year was the grand opening of the new museum.
meanings.sent2: The noteworthiest students were recognized for their academic achievements.
meanings.sent3: The noteworthiest thing about the joke was its unexpected punchline.
meanings.sent4: Her noteworthiest quality is her ability to empathize with others.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood as the noteworthiest landmark in the vast landscape.
